tool_description: Connects to multiple carrier APIs to retrieve standardized tracking information and shipment updates across different logistics providers.

carrier_name.description: Name of the shipping carrier (FedEx, UPS, DHL, etc.)

api_key.description: API authentication key for the carrier

shipment_references.description: Array of carrier-specific shipment reference numbers

data_format.description: Preferred data format: standard or detailed

include_events.description: Whether to include detailed tracking events

error_messages: Unsupported carrier: The specified carrier is not supported. Check available carrier list.
Invalid API credentials: Authentication failed with provided api_key. Verify credentials and permissions.
API rate limit exceeded: Too many requests to carrier API. Wait before retrying or reduce request frequency.
Invalid shipment reference: One or more references are not recognized by the carrier system.
Connection timeout: Request exceeded timeout_seconds limit. Check network connectivity or increase timeout.
Data format not supported: Use either 'standard' or 'detailed' for data_format parameter.
usage: Provide carrier_name, valid api_key, and shipment_references array. Optionally specify data_format, include_events, and timeout_seconds for customized responses.

carrier_response.description: Raw response data from carrier API

parsed_data.description: Standardized tracking information for each shipment

api_status.description: Status of API connection and response
